name: intraocular
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
inside the eye: Intraocular pressure has been reported to decrease during pregnancy. Your doctor can detect an intraocular tumour with a thorough eye examination.
More examplesFewer examplesTreatment must therefore focus on lowering intraocular pressure either with eye drops or surgery.These intraocular tumours are quite different from those encountered elsewhere in the body.The medical community is still working on a way to reduce the frequency of intraocular injections.
